== JSON-RPC ==

This is the wiki page for the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/txjsonrpc|txJSON-RPC project]]</nowiki>. The goal of this code is to assist developers in creating python JSON-RPC servers using the <nowiki>[[http://twistedmatrix.com/trac/|Twisted Network Engine]]</nowiki>.

=== Twisted ===

<nowiki>[[txJSON-RPC-TwistedWeb]]</nowiki> - an HTTP implementation based on <code>twisted.web</code>; currently supports Basic Authentication (based completely on Itamar's work; this work is not original, but a simple conversion of his)

<nowiki>[[txJSON-RPC-TwistedWeb2]]</nowiki> - an HTTP implementation based on <code>twisted.web2</code> (ditto on the parenthetical from above)

<nowiki>[[txJSON-RPC-TwistedNetstring]]</nowiki> - a TCP implementation based on Twisted Python's <nowiki>[[http://twistedmatrix.com/trac/browser/trunk/twisted/protocols/basic.py?rev=16739#L32|implementation]]</nowiki> of the <nowiki>[[http://cr.yp.to/proto/netstrings.txt|Netstring protocol]]</nowiki>

==== Installation ====

Very easy installation:
<pre>
sudo easy_install txJSON-RPC
</pre>

Releases are <nowiki>[[http://pypi.python.org/pypi/txJSON-RPC|here]]</nowiki>. 

Source code is <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/txjsonrpc|here]]</nowiki>.
